vulnerability_findings.name: use-nested-if
vulnerability_findings.message: Using nested is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in Arrays.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.23', '^0.4.24']
	- Arrays.sol#3 declares pragma solidity^0.4.24
	- Arrays.sol#37 declares pragma solidity^0.4.23

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in Arrays.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (Arrays.sol#37): it allows old versions
